featured.text: The walls of each capsule may be made of wood, metal or any rigid material, but are often fiberglass or plastic.

definition.zh_def: 堅硬的；不易彎曲或變形的；不靈活的
definition.en_def: Not flexible or pliable; stiff and inflexible.
definition.example: The rigid rules of the organization made it difficult for employees to express their creativity.
